overview:
Shubhra has vast experience in corporations ranging from startups to global giants to give her an in-depth understanding of all the aspects of business lifecycle and has thorough knowledge of financial bearings of businesses.

She started off her carrier in a startup as a developer and recently resigned from Royal Bank of Canada as a Vice President in Global Arbitrage and Trading Group where she built complex pnl and risk analytics and assisted in trading Fixed Income and Credit Default Swaps for the Credit Opportunities and Trading Desk.

She is the Co-Founder of Unwind App Inc.
